content: assembly stitch the leaves to the base of the stem stitching through the back loop of all three middle stitches of the leaves for stability secure the tip of each end of the leaves to the second single_crochet down from the top of the bracts on each respective side weave in all remaining ends assembly tips do not weave in ends after completing the bracts stem or leaves these can be used for the assembly so you have fewer ends to weave in when finishing the motif assembly can be completed either before or after working the flower petals depending on your personal preference © darkwood designs 2025 do not sell or distribute without permission 4
